lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Tai!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I knew I would catch you here.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Oh, hey Locke.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: How have you been?

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Pretty good.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Really? You sound more tired than usual.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Is that so?

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: I feel pretty fine though.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: C'mon, what's bothering you? You can tell me!

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Well... To tell you the truth, my client recently hit a writer's block.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: It seems like they're at a difficult part of the plot.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Hmm, what's the part?

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: The antagonists are winning, and I can't imagine a sensible way for the heroes to dig their way out of the situation.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: I'm not sure I even have what it takes to suggest a whole new plot ploint, I'm just an editor after all...

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: And the world's foremost expert on trains and train-related media! Give yourself a bit more credit!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: You're THE Tai P. Rider, I'm sure you've got oodles of great ideas!

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: I don't know why you're shortening my middle name, it's just Perry.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: It sounds cooler this way.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: If you say so...

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Anyways, I don’t know... Reading and editing stories is one thing, but creating stuff that hasn’t been finished?

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: It's daunting...

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: How so?

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: It's like my client's train of thought has gotten lost in the darkness, and I don't know where to start building the rest of the railroad to steer it back on course.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: There's just a universe of train-related possibilities, and who knows how many of those possibilities are wrong.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Hmm, I would just make things up as I go.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: I guess that's one way of doing it.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: But I've always thought of it more like...

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Like a writer has to discover the truth of their universe, and then they have a responsibility to get it right.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Sculptors can already see a complete figure within a huge hunk of granite, but they just need to chisel it out.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Stories are like that, except I can only vaguely sense their full shape.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Certainly not well enough that I can chisel it out without damaging it.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Like what if I make the wrong move, and people don't like the plot?

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: What if the heroes win in a way that doesn't make sense?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Does it have to make sense?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Can't the character get a heroic second wind from the power of friendship and just come back stronger?

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Can it really be that simple?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Well why not?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: It happened in Power Traingers all the time, didn't it?

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: That's... That's true!

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: The plot didn't make sense, but since it was executed in a fun way, the audience generally didn't mind.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Thanks Locke! I'm glad I could talk to you about this...

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Glad I could help!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: But don't you have other coworkers that you could bounce ideas off of?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Not to throw myself under the bus, but I'm not sure I'm the most qualified person to help with this kinda thing.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: I don't know...

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: I feel like they have other things going on, so I don’t want to distract them from their own editing projects.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Huh... Well, if you say so.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Oh! Quick topic jump.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I saw you ribbitting about some Power Traingers event happening in town square.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Huh? Oh!

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Yeah it'll be coming up in a few days!

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: It's a live performance to promote the new movie coming out.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: We're finally going to meet the Stationmaster and find out where the last missing train went!

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Wait, are you caught up on the show?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Sadly, no. I've been kinda busy lately so I haven't watch the recent episodes.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: The moment you miss one episode, it gets hard to catch back up.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Oh...

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: But I can go with you to the event. A live performance sounds fun!

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Yeah, sure. Will you be free next Wednesday?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: That's usually your day off right? I'll try to make it!

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Cool. I'll see you then Locke.
